title: How to Play Wii Games on the Wii U

steps.headline: Synchronize a Wii Remote to the Wii U.
steps.description: You synchronize a Wii Remote to the Wii U the same way that you synchronize one to the Wii. The Sync button on the console is located to the right of the power button.

steps.headline: Turn on your Wii U console with a Wii disc in the disc drive.
At the Wii U menu, select the "Wii Mode" option.
steps.description: You have to use a Wii Remote from here.

steps.headline: Go to the Disc Channel, which is the channel at the top left of the screen.

text: Synchronize a Wii Remote to the Wii U. You synchronize a Wii Remote to the Wii U the same way that you synchronize one to the Wii. The Sync button on the console is located to the right of the power button. Turn on your Wii U console with a Wii disc in the disc drive.  At the Wii U menu, select the "Wii Mode" option. You have to use a Wii Remote from here. Go to the Disc Channel, which is the channel at the top left of the screen. From there, load the game.
